Reviews.Title: “Perfect location & value for money”
Reviews.Author: carondarwood
Reviews.Content: hotel reviews perfectly adequate weekend friend found staff friendly helpful hotel clean breakfast expect tourist hotel excellent cappucino offer service required location perfect close isnt hotel necessarily romantic weekend time definitely recommend stay add hotel sort bar free wifi available charge

Reviews.Title: “Don't expect much and you won't be disappointed.”

Reviews.Content: hotel location exactly middle walking distance attractions rome bus depot outside hotel easy hotel ugly dated terrible staying wonderful hotels tuscany sorrento money shock hotel wore realized werent gonna anyway ease walking trevi fountain spanish steps short comings hotel breakfast disappointing mainly experiences hotels breakfast consists coffee tea bread triangle cheese spreads butter jam fresh exciting searched neighborhood hotel money didnt moved quickly prepared rome free internet sum dont expect wont disappointed recommend hotel location
